unnormalised: Hey! Athlete biographies are my fav! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh, what an inspiration! Remember *Bhaag Milkha Bhaag*? The movie was great, but the real story is even better! Imagine training like that! Talking about dedication, have you read about PT Usha's struggles to get into the Olympics? Sports Authority of India should document more such stories. So inspiring for young athletes in places like Kerala.
